rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall leading to the living area and kitchen with ample natural light from north and east openings, adhering to Vastu principles.
Spacious open-plan living room with industrial aesthetic elements (exposed brick, metal finishes), designed for social gatherings. Features large windows on the east side for morning light.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a modern open-plan layout that encourages communal dining, incorporating industrial design elements.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with high-end appliances and ample counter space. Design includes an island for casual dining, complementing the industrial theme.
Compact living area and bedroom for servants ensuring privacy and functionality. Includes a small kitchenette and bathroom.
A dedicated space designed as an industrial-styled home theater with acoustic treatments, ambient lighting, and integrated seating, providing immersive entertainment experience.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom ensuring privacy. Positioned to receive favorable energy flow as per Vastu (south-east corner).

openings.description: Large double door entrance from the main road, designed with industrial metal and glass elements, ensuring a welcoming yet robust entry.
Service entry door for utility access and guest exit, complementing the overall design and maintaining security.
Multiple windows along the east facade to maximize natural light in living areas and kitchen.
Balcony access in the master bedroom and dining area, providing outdoor space with industrial-style railings.
